THE CITY COUNCIL

The City of Elsa shall be vested in a Council composed of a Mayor and Four Councilmen, and serve a four (4) year term. City Council meetings are held on the third Tuesday of each month, and the City of Elsa Council Chambers at 102 S. Diana Street, Elsa, Texas
